{{Codepointer|Status change}} '''A_IceSetTics'''
(''no parameter'')
Changes the number of [[tic]]s that the calling actor will remain in its current state to a random value between 70 and 133 (approximatively between two and four seconds). If the [[sector]] where the calling actor stands is a [[damaging floor]] which inflicts fire damage, this value is divided by four. If, instead, it deals ice damage, then the value is multiplied by two. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|IceChunk}} and derived classes.
